shortContent:
The Techmarine may be fitted with and use a Servoharness
(see page 177 in Chapter V: Armoury) and may use
weapons fitted to the harness in which he is proficient.
content:
The Techmarine has had his implanted systems integrated
with a many-armed servo harness, allowing him to use its
pincer-arms and weapon arrays as if they were extra limbs of
his body. The Techmarine may be fitted with and use a Servoharness
(see page 177 in Chapter V: Armoury) and may use
weapons fitted to the harness in which he is proficient.
